summary: This document contains a financial summary for Southern Financial LLC for the period of December 1, 2018, to December 31, 2018. It details account values, cash deposits, withdrawals, income, expenses, and portfolio holdings, including equities and fixed income securities. The document highlights significant financial transactions and the overall performance of the portfolio during the specified period. This document appears to be a financial statement detailing the portfolio holdings and transactions of Southern Financial LLC for the period of December 1, 2018, to December 31, 2018. It includes information on securities bought and sold, dividends received, and various fees and taxes withheld. The document emphasizes the importance of accurate reporting for tax purposes and outlines the responsibilities of the account holder regarding their investments. This document appears to be a financial statement detailing account information, transactions, and disclosures related to securities held by an individual or entity. It includes information about account balances, investment performance, and important disclosures regarding arbitration and account management. This document contains detailed financial portfolio holdings for a specific account, including various equities, fixed income securities, and cash balances. It outlines the market values, cost bases, and estimated annual income yields for the holdings, as well as disclosures related to foreign currency transactions and realized gains and losses. This document contains a detailed financial statement for Southern Financial LLC, including a schedule of realized gains and losses for the period of November 1, 2018, to November 30, 2018. It outlines various transactions, including securities bought and sold, dividends received, and distributions, along with adjustments for tax reporting purposes. The document emphasizes the importance of consulting with a tax advisor for accurate reporting. This document contains a financial summary for Southern Financial LLC, detailing income, expenses, and portfolio holdings for the period of October 1, 2018, to October 31, 2018. It includes information on various investments, including corporate bonds and equities, as well as cash balances in multiple currencies. This document contains financial transaction details for Southern Financial LLC, including realized gains and losses, securities transactions, and account management information. It outlines various financial activities, including purchases, sales, dividends, and fees, as well as disclosures related to the role of Pershing as a clearing broker.
